original_text: And the king of Israel said, “Seize Micaiah and take him back to Amon the governor of the city and to Joash the king's son,
korean_text: 이스라엘 왕이 이르되 미가야를 잡아 시장 아몬과 왕자 요아스에게로 끌고 돌아가서

sentences.original_text: And the king of Israel said,
and take him back to Amon the governor of the city
and to Joash the king's son,
